content: and the 1st chain make a treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd and 3rd chain* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the 2nd chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in both chains treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 3 sts chain 2 miss the next st and the 1st chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd chain make a bptr bpdc in the next st followed by a treble_crochet double_crochet in the next make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn 9 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st miss the next st make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the following st fptr fpdc in the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the 1st chain *chain 2 miss the 2nd chain and then the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 6 sts chain 2 miss the last st and the 1st chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the 1st chain* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the 2nd chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 6 sts chain 2 miss the next st and the 1st chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd chain and in the next st then make a fptr fpdc in the next then a treble_crochet double_crochet make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn 10 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st miss the next st make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below miss the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st bptr bpdc in the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the 1st chain * chain 2 miss the 2nd chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts chain 2 miss the next st and the 1st chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd chain and in the next 4 sts treble_crochet double_crochet in the 1st chain* repeat from * to * 4 more times chain 2 miss the 2nd chain and the next st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 4 sts chain 2 miss the next st and the 1st chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the 2nd chain treble_crochet double_crochet in the next 2 sts make a bptr bpdc in the next st followed by a treble_crochet double_crochet in the next make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below treble_crochet double_crochet in the last 2 sts turn 11 chain 3 this is your first st treble_crochet double_crochet in the next st miss the next st make a v-st in the chain space of the v-st below miss
